title: The Fading Nexus
goal: Kaelen and Elara investigate a corrupted site, Kaelen's powers stir.

beats.summary: Elara leads Kaelen to a site of recent, unusual magical disturbance or decay, an ancient nexus point now tainted.
They discover evidence of the Whispering Corruption actively feeding on the site's energy, weakening its ancient wards.
Kaelen's latent powers stir, causing a surge of energy that momentarily pushes back the corruption, startling both him and Elara.
